sentence: What do you call a black and white spotted cow? a moo-latto!!
first_new_sentence: The cow let out a loud moo in the field.
second_new_sentence: The sound reverberated as the farmer called for the moo.

sentence: My friend said he was a harp.. but he was obviously a lyre.
first_new_sentence: The musician played a beautiful tune on his lyre during the concert.
second_new_sentence: The story was as deceptive as a lyre can be.
